name: mr_pete
text: More Usability Engineers are employed at Old Navy than any other firm.

name: rowboat
text: Based on the bios, I have to assume that Onstad may have been a Usability Engineer in his pre-Achewood days.  Another reason to be thankful for the dot-com bust.

name: em2
text: I believe this has come up at least once in interviews with him.

name: ambala
text: Shortcakes is waving around his not arm.

name: ssddr
text: this strip seems like its in response to something and i really wish i knew what

name: varnish
text: I think I used to drink with Steven. Nice guy.

name: songbirdspectre
text: i don't understand. but i laughed at the one-armed leprechaun.

name: tetrisattack
text:
Achewood contest: make a new character?
Chris this is gold here. You would barely have to work anymore.

name: nathanielperson
text: In stark contrast to the cats we will one day know and love, Albert is a quadruped.

name: norrin
text: I think the implication here is that he is a real cat and not a stuffed one.

name: riazm
text:
interesting theory
I'd always assumed the dirtiest dudes in town were real cats, but what you say makes me question my beliefs.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
i think that they are real cats, as ray may or may not have been neutered, simply the fact that it was an issue implies that he was a real cat

i don't think anyone is concerned about a stuffed animal being neutered

name: rowboat
text: There has never been a stuffed cat featured at any point in this comic. That's crazy talk.

name: foetus_punch
text: They are real cats that Chris Onstad owns. Or rather, his wife does. I am convinced of this fact.

name: rowboat
text: I don't feel proud of myself for knowing this, but there are no cats in the Onstad house.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
there are dogs in the onstad house, but they never show them in the comic

this has always perplexed me

name: foetus_punch
text: Blast. I am a fool.

name: i_love_kate
text: They're all real cats. Remember that, at times, Ray and Pat have both demonstrated quadrupedal attributes. Generally they keep to their hind feet, but for all we know its simply a matter of preference.

name: dovey
text: It's hard to hold on to crispy Stellas when you're on four feet.

name: jonmw
text: We have a photo of one, back from when the baby was born. I think. Something about how a dog's long ears allow them to hear and be hurt by non-production.

name: dickie_roxx
text: Of course we've seen Chris's dogs. They are literally disgusting.

name: rowboat
text: Also, they're married.

name: max
text: Steven is one of the most memorable one-off jokes from when I first read the strip. I like to think that even if he won't ever get ahead in life, he is still a good person.

name: evolume
text: And still strong.

name: foetus_punch
text: Muscles are so fucking funny. And the idea that muscles can help you get ahead in life is double funny.

name: autrepoupee
text: steve is every friend i ever had except not that strong but really good at guitar notes

name: smugairle
text: Leo Fontanette seems to be the anti-Steven. Successful, arrogant, and with rockin thighs rather than arms. Steven may not have had much goin for him, but at least his niceness meant that he didn't die in a cornfield.

name: turnabout
text: Panels 2 and 4 are pure gold. (Plus, Lie Bot.) How is this strip a 3?

name: featurelessvoid
text: This strip was too nice to ever get ahead in life.

name: bassguitarbill
text: The sad thing is that, until you mentioned it, I didn't even realize that it was Lie Bot, and that's why we never see these guys again.  Chubby.

name: lokier
text: "the one arm" hahaha

name: spectre
text: One sign of not getting ahead in life: you work at Denny's, where they serve the Moons Over My Hammy. And the people who eat there are the kind who will raise your tip for praising their good taste when they ORDER a Moons Over My Hammy. Oh, BTW, one order of Moons Over My Hammy has more cholesterol that the entire frickin' ACHEWOOD COOKBOOK!

name: phoenixultima
text: Another sign: actually thinking that "Moons over my hammy" is funny or clever.

name: bhlaab
text: his arm is in his fucking shirt

name: honesttom
text: Albert seems to have a 1920s cartoon thing going on there.

name: chuchurocket
text: in the 1920s, they called this an uncle spinny durvish.  really?  no, i'm just bored.

name: ishuta
text: A comment left by ishuta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, EM2, rowboat, jargonmaster, DorothyPoopBot)

name: euphemisms
text: totally. the strip's all downhill from this point on.

name: rowboat
text: In this medium your sarcasm could almost be mistaken for actual opinion. Wait...don't tell me that's your actual opinion....you poor, poor children....

name: muffinzz
text: I hope you're kidding. Ray and Beef haven't even been introduced at this point.

name: autrepoupee
text: how could anybody not know these two comments are jokes i mean SERIOUSLY what the HELL people

name: dovey
text: This is where ishuta jumped the shark

name: dovey
text: "Jumped the shark" is such a stupid phrase

name: jamb23
text: This pier is where Henry Winkler jumped the shark.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
lie bot actually lies again

these are not real characters

name: joeyramoney
text: thank god.

name: redjoker
text: chubby for avatar/comment synchronicity

name: joeyramoney
text: onstads' first attempt at drawing cats was an exercise best not repeated.

name: oishii
text: Those are some wacky shoes Shortcakes is wearing.

name: nicolae
text: My father knew a man in Greece with one arm who knew more languages than I have fingers.  He was also functionally illiterate.  Just throwin' that out there.

name: lollipopsichord
text:
I only rated this a five because I left my computer on all night and when I woke up that fucking cat was staring me right in the face.
I lol'd.

name: awko
text: If I see that fucking cat one more time...

name: singtralala
text: man i love liebot

name: i_love_kate
text: You have an awesome avatar. Is it supposed to line up so that it looks like Ray is singing your name?

name: carlyle
text: Panel three: Platinum

name: spaceandrew
text: Poor nice people. Never gonna get ahead in life.

name: puguglypress
text: I hope Steve found a girlfriend, I mean he was really getting depressing for awhile there.
